Item: We published a new Julia package for implementing the [Hybrid A* algorithm](https://github.com/CU-ADCL/HybridAStar.jl).

The ADCL will be part of a major new [effort](https://www.colorado.edu/aerospace/2023/08/21/cu-boulder-wins-major-air-force-grant-track-objects-orbiting-moon) to improve space domain awareness in cislunar space, collaborating with researchers at CU, Texas A&M, and Georgia Tech.
We are organizing a [workshop on inference and decision making at RSS 2023](https://sites.google.com/view/idmav-workshop-rss-2023/home?authuser=1) on July 10.

Our paper on "[Optimality Guarantees for Particle Belief Approximation of POMDPs](https://arxiv.org/abs/2210.05015)" has been accepted for a journal publication in the Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research (JAIR).

Our paper on "[Explanation through Reward Model Reconciliation using POMDP Tree Search](https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.00931)" has been accepted for presentation at the IEEE Intâ€™l. Conference on Assured Autonomy (ICAA) 2023

Our paper on "[Planning with SiMBA: Motion Planning under Uncertainty for Temporal Goals using Simplified Belief Guides](https://arxiv.org/abs/2210.10202)" has been accepted for presentation at IEEE Int'l Conf. on Robotics and Automation (ICRA) 2023.
Our paper on "[Navigation between initial and desired community states using shortcuts](https://arxiv.org/abs/2204.07629)" has been accepted for a journal publication in *Ecology Letters*.

Tyler and Jackson presented their respective research on [imperfect information games](https://amostech.com/TechnicalPapers/2022/Poster/Becker.pdf) and [adaptive stress testing](https://amostech.com/TechnicalPapers/2022/Machine-Learning-for-SSA-Applications/Tucker.pdf) at the AMOS conference.
We are organizing a [workshop on game theory for CoRL 2022](https://sites.google.com/view/corl-2022-games-workshop/) on Dec 15.
We released the POMDPTools package, consolidating important tools for [POMDPs.jl](https://github.com/JuliaPOMDP/POMDPs.jl)
Our paper on "[Automaton-Guided Control Synthesis for Signal Temporal Logic Specifications](https://arxiv.org/abs/2207.03662)" has been accepted for presentation at CDC 2022.
Himanshu successfully defended his Master's Thesis. Congratulations Himanshu!

Ben Kraske and John Tucker have received the [NSF GRFP award](https://www.colorado.edu/aerospace/2022/04/12/five-cu-boulder-aerospace-students-earn-major-nsf-graduate-research-fellowships). Congratulations Ben and John!
Our paper on "[Gaussian Belief Trees for Chance Constrained Asymptotically Optimal Motion Planning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.12407)" has been accepted for presentation at ICRA 2022.

Our paper on "[Intention-Aware Navigation in Crowds with Extended-Space POMDP Planning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2206.10028)" has been accepted for presentation at AAMAS 2022. [(Slides)](https://adcl.slides.com/himanshugupta-3/deck-a76041)
